mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER where id = #{id} and useyn='y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (`id`, `pwd`, `name`, `intro`, `birthday`, `email`, `address`, `gender`, `joindate`, `useyn`, `publicyn`) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{address}, #{gender}, now(), 'y', 'y')
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM relationship WHERE receiver=#{id} AND status='y' union all SELECT count(*) FROM relationship WHERE sender=#{id} AND status='y' union all SELECT count(*) FROM relationship WHERE sender=#{id} AND status='r'
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd}, name=#{name}, birthday=#{birthday}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, gender=#{gender}, publicyn=#{publicyn}, profile_img=#{profile_img}, intro=concat(#{intro},' \n') where id=#{id}
